00066 void fluidsim_init(FluidsimModifierData *fluidmd)
00067 {
00068 #ifdef WITH_MOD_FLUID
00069     if (fluidmd)
00070     {
00071         FluidsimSettings *fss = MEM_callocN(sizeof(FluidsimSettings), "fluidsimsettings");
00072 
00073         fluidmd->fss = fss;
00074         
00075         if (!fss)
00076             return;
00077         
00078         fss->fmd = fluidmd;
00079         fss->type = OB_FLUIDSIM_ENABLE;
00080         fss->show_advancedoptions = 0;
00081 
00082         fss->resolutionxyz = 65;
00083         fss->previewresxyz = 45;
00084         fss->realsize = 0.5;
00085         fss->guiDisplayMode = 2; // preview
00086         fss->renderDisplayMode = 3; // render
00087 
00088         fss->viscosityValue = 1.0;
00089         fss->viscosityExponent = 6;
00090         
00091         fss->grav[0] = 0.0;
00092         fss->grav[1] = 0.0;
00093         fss->grav[2] = -9.81;
00094 
00095         fss->animStart = 0.0; 
00096         fss->animEnd = 4.0;
00097         fss->animRate = 1.0;
00098         fss->gstar = 0.005; // used as normgstar
00099         fss->maxRefine = -1;
00100         // maxRefine is set according to resolutionxyz during bake
00101 
00102         // fluid/inflow settings
00103         // fss->iniVel --> automatically set to 0
00104 
00105         modifier_path_init(fss->surfdataPath, sizeof(fss->surfdataPath), "cache_fluid");
00106 
00107         // first init of bounding box
00108         // no bounding box needed
00109         
00110         // todo - reuse default init from elbeem!
00111         fss->typeFlags = OB_FSBND_PARTSLIP | OB_FSSG_NOOBS;
00112         fss->domainNovecgen = 0;
00113         fss->volumeInitType = 1; // volume
00114         fss->partSlipValue = 0.2;
00115 
00116         fss->generateTracers = 0;
00117         fss->generateParticles = 0.0;
00118         fss->surfaceSmoothing = 1.0;
00119         fss->surfaceSubdivs = 0.0;
00120         fss->particleInfSize = 0.0;
00121         fss->particleInfAlpha = 0.0;
00122     
00123         // init fluid control settings
00124         fss->attractforceStrength = 0.2;
00125         fss->attractforceRadius = 0.75;
00126         fss->velocityforceStrength = 0.2;
00127         fss->velocityforceRadius = 0.75;
00128         fss->cpsTimeStart = fss->animStart;
00129         fss->cpsTimeEnd = fss->animEnd;
00130         fss->cpsQuality = 10.0; // 1.0 / 10.0 => means 0.1 width
00131         
00132         /*
00133          * BAD TODO: this is done in buttons_object.c in the moment
00134          * Mesh *mesh = ob->data;
00135          * // calculate bounding box
00136          * fluid_get_bb(mesh->mvert, mesh->totvert, ob->obmat, fss->bbStart, fss->bbSize);
00137          */
00138         
00139         fss->meshVelocities = NULL;
00140         
00141         fss->lastgoodframe = -1;
00142         
00143         fss->flag |= OB_FLUIDSIM_ACTIVE;
00144 
00145     }
00146 #else
00147     (void)fluidmd; /* unused */
00148 #endif
00149     return;
00150 }
00151 
00152 void fluidsim_free(FluidsimModifierData *fluidmd)
00153 {
00154     if (fluidmd && fluidmd->fss) {
00155         if (fluidmd->fss->meshVelocities) {
00156             MEM_freeN(fluidmd->fss->meshVelocities);
00157             fluidmd->fss->meshVelocities = NULL;
00158         }
00159         MEM_freeN(fluidmd->fss);
00160     }
00161     
00162     return;
00163 }

00165 #ifdef WITH_MOD_FLUID
00166 /* read .bobj.gz file into a fluidsimDerivedMesh struct */
00167 static DerivedMesh *fluidsim_read_obj(const char *filename, const MPoly *mp_example)
00168 {
00169     int wri = 0,i;
00170     int gotBytes;
00171     gzFile gzf;
00172     int numverts = 0, numfaces = 0;
00173     DerivedMesh *dm = NULL;
00174     MPoly *mp;
00175     MLoop *ml;
00176     MVert *mv;
00177     short *normals, *no_s;
00178     float no[3];
00179 
00180     const short mp_mat_nr = mp_example->mat_nr;
00181     const char  mp_flag =   mp_example->flag;
00182 
00183     // ------------------------------------------------
00184     // get numverts + numfaces first
00185     // ------------------------------------------------
00186     gzf = BLI_gzopen(filename, "rb");
00187     if (!gzf)
00188     {
00189         return NULL;
00190     }
00191 
00192     // read numverts
00193     gotBytes = gzread(gzf, &wri, sizeof(wri));
00194     numverts = wri;
00195 
00196     // skip verts
00197     gotBytes = gzseek(gzf, numverts * 3 * sizeof(float), SEEK_CUR) != -1;
00198 
00199 
00200     // read number of normals
00201     if (gotBytes)
00202         gotBytes = gzread(gzf, &wri, sizeof(wri));
00203 
00204     // skip normals
00205     gotBytes = gzseek(gzf, numverts * 3 * sizeof(float), SEEK_CUR) != -1;
00206 
00207     /* get no. of triangles */
00208     if (gotBytes)
00209         gotBytes = gzread(gzf, &wri, sizeof(wri));
00210     numfaces = wri;
00211 
00212     gzclose(gzf);
00213     // ------------------------------------------------
00214 
00215     if (!numfaces || !numverts || !gotBytes)
00216         return NULL;
00217 
00218     gzf = BLI_gzopen(filename, "rb");
00219     if (!gzf)
00220     {
00221         return NULL;
00222     }
00223 
00224     dm = CDDM_new(numverts, 0, 0, numfaces * 3, numfaces);
00225 
00226     if (!dm)
00227     {
00228         gzclose(gzf);
00229         return NULL;
00230     }
00231 
00232     // read numverts
00233     gotBytes = gzread(gzf, &wri, sizeof(wri));
00234 
00235     // read vertex position from file
00236     mv = CDDM_get_verts(dm);
00237 
00238     for (i=0; i<numverts; i++, mv++)
00239         gotBytes = gzread(gzf, mv->co, sizeof(float) * 3);
00240 
00241     // should be the same as numverts
00242     gotBytes = gzread(gzf, &wri, sizeof(wri));
00243     if (wri != numverts)
00244     {
00245         if (dm)
00246             dm->release(dm);
00247         gzclose(gzf);
00248         return NULL;
00249     }
00250 
00251     normals = MEM_callocN(sizeof(short) * numverts * 3, "fluid_tmp_normals" );
00252     if (!normals)
00253     {
00254         if (dm)
00255             dm->release(dm);
00256         gzclose(gzf);
00257         return NULL;
00258     }
00259 
00260     // read normals from file (but don't save them yet)
00261     for (i=numverts, no_s= normals; i>0; i--, no_s += 3)
00262     {
00263         gotBytes = gzread(gzf, no, sizeof(float) * 3);
00264         normal_float_to_short_v3(no_s, no);
00265     }
00266 
00267     /* read no. of triangles */
00268     gotBytes = gzread(gzf, &wri, sizeof(wri));
00269 
00270     if (wri!=numfaces) {
00271         printf("Fluidsim: error in reading data from file.\n");
00272         if (dm)
00273             dm->release(dm);
00274         gzclose(gzf);
00275         MEM_freeN(normals);
00276         return NULL;
00277     }
00278 
00279     // read triangles from file
00280     mp = CDDM_get_polys(dm);
00281     ml = CDDM_get_loops(dm);
00282     for (i=0; i < numfaces; i++, mp++, ml += 3)
00283     {
00284         int face[3];
00285 
00286         gotBytes = gzread(gzf, face, sizeof(int) * 3);
00287 
00288         /* initialize from existing face */
00289         mp->mat_nr = mp_mat_nr;
00290         mp->flag =   mp_flag;
00291 
00292         mp->loopstart = i * 3;
00293         mp->totloop = 3;
00294 
00295         ml[0].v = face[0];
00296         ml[1].v = face[1];
00297         ml[2].v = face[2];
00298 
00299     }
00300 
00301     gzclose(gzf);
00302 
00303     CDDM_calc_edges(dm);
00304 
00305     CDDM_apply_vert_normals(dm, (short (*)[3])normals);
00306     MEM_freeN(normals);
00307 
00308     // CDDM_calc_normals(result);
00309     return dm;
00310 }
00311 
00312 
00313 void fluid_get_bb(MVert *mvert, int totvert, float obmat[][4],
00314          /*RET*/ float start[3], /*RET*/ float size[3] )
00315 {
00316     float bbsx=0.0, bbsy=0.0, bbsz=0.0;
00317     float bbex=1.0, bbey=1.0, bbez=1.0;
00318     int i;
00319     float vec[3];
00320 
00321     if (totvert == 0) {
00322         zero_v3(start);
00323         zero_v3(size);
00324         return;
00325     }
00326 
00327     copy_v3_v3(vec, mvert[0].co);
00328     mul_m4_v3(obmat, vec);
00329     bbsx = vec[0]; bbsy = vec[1]; bbsz = vec[2];
00330     bbex = vec[0]; bbey = vec[1]; bbez = vec[2];
00331 
00332     for (i = 1; i < totvert; i++) {
00333         copy_v3_v3(vec, mvert[i].co);
00334         mul_m4_v3(obmat, vec);
00335 
00336         if (vec[0] < bbsx) { bbsx= vec[0]; }
00337         if (vec[1] < bbsy) { bbsy= vec[1]; }
00338         if (vec[2] < bbsz) { bbsz= vec[2]; }
00339         if (vec[0] > bbex) { bbex= vec[0]; }
00340         if (vec[1] > bbey) { bbey= vec[1]; }
00341         if (vec[2] > bbez) { bbez= vec[2]; }
00342     }
00343 
00344     // return values...
00345     if (start) {
00346         start[0] = bbsx;
00347         start[1] = bbsy;
00348         start[2] = bbsz;
00349     }
00350     if (size) {
00351         size[0] = bbex-bbsx;
00352         size[1] = bbey-bbsy;
00353         size[2] = bbez-bbsz;
00354     }
00355 }

00360 
00361 void fluid_estimate_memory(Object *ob, FluidsimSettings *fss, char *value)
00362 {
00363     Mesh *mesh;
00364 
00365     value[0]= '\0';
00366 
00367     if (ob->type == OB_MESH) {
00368         /* use mesh bounding box and object scaling */
00369         mesh= ob->data;
00370 
00371         fluid_get_bb(mesh->mvert, mesh->totvert, ob->obmat, fss->bbStart, fss->bbSize);
00372         elbeemEstimateMemreq(fss->resolutionxyz, fss->bbSize[0],fss->bbSize[1],fss->bbSize[2], fss->maxRefine, value);
00373     }
00374 }

00377 /* read zipped fluidsim velocities into the co's of the fluidsimsettings normals struct */
00378 static void fluidsim_read_vel_cache(FluidsimModifierData *fluidmd, DerivedMesh *dm, char *filename)
00379 {
00380     int wri, i, j;
00381     float wrf;
00382     gzFile gzf;
00383     FluidsimSettings *fss = fluidmd->fss;
00384     int len = strlen(filename);
00385     int totvert = dm->getNumVerts(dm);
00386     FluidVertexVelocity *velarray = NULL;
00387 
00388     // mesh and vverts have to be valid from loading...
00389 
00390     if (fss->meshVelocities)
00391         MEM_freeN(fss->meshVelocities);
00392 
00393     if (len<7)
00394     {
00395         return;
00396     }
00397 
00398     if (fss->domainNovecgen>0) return;
00399 
00400     fss->meshVelocities = MEM_callocN(sizeof(FluidVertexVelocity)*dm->getNumVerts(dm), "Fluidsim_velocities");
00401     fss->totvert = totvert;
00402 
00403     velarray = fss->meshVelocities;
00404 
00405     // .bobj.gz , correct filename
00406     // 87654321
00407     filename[len-6] = 'v';
00408     filename[len-5] = 'e';
00409     filename[len-4] = 'l';
00410 
00411     gzf = BLI_gzopen(filename, "rb");
00412     if (!gzf)
00413     {
00414         MEM_freeN(fss->meshVelocities);
00415         fss->meshVelocities = NULL;
00416         return;
00417     }
00418 
00419     gzread(gzf, &wri, sizeof( wri ));
00420     if (wri != totvert)
00421     {
00422         MEM_freeN(fss->meshVelocities);
00423         fss->meshVelocities = NULL;
00424         return;
00425     }
00426 
00427     for (i=0; i<totvert;i++)
00428     {
00429         for (j=0; j<3; j++)
00430         {
00431             gzread(gzf, &wrf, sizeof( wrf ));
00432             velarray[i].vel[j] = wrf;
00433         }
00434     }
00435 
00436     gzclose(gzf);
00437 }
00438 
00439 static DerivedMesh *fluidsim_read_cache(Object *ob, DerivedMesh *orgdm, FluidsimModifierData *fluidmd, int framenr, int useRenderParams)
00440 {
00441     int displaymode = 0;
00442     int curFrame = framenr - 1 /*scene->r.sfra*/; /* start with 0 at start frame */
00443     char targetFile[FILE_MAX];
00444     FluidsimSettings *fss = fluidmd->fss;
00445     DerivedMesh *dm = NULL;
00446     MPoly *mpoly;
00447     MPoly mp_example = {0};
00448 
00449     if (!useRenderParams) {
00450         displaymode = fss->guiDisplayMode;
00451     }
00452     else {
00453         displaymode = fss->renderDisplayMode;
00454     }
00455 
00456     switch (displaymode) {
00457     case 1:
00458         /* just display original object */
00459         return NULL;
00460     case 2:
00461         /* use preview mesh */
00462         BLI_join_dirfile(targetFile, sizeof(targetFile), fss->surfdataPath, OB_FLUIDSIM_SURF_PREVIEW_OBJ_FNAME);
00463         break;
00464     default: /* 3 */
00465         /* 3. use final mesh */
00466         BLI_join_dirfile(targetFile, sizeof(targetFile), fss->surfdataPath, OB_FLUIDSIM_SURF_FINAL_OBJ_FNAME);
00467         break;
00468     }
00469 
00470     /* offset baked frame */
00471     curFrame += fss->frameOffset;
00472 
00473     BLI_path_abs(targetFile, modifier_path_relbase(ob));
00474     BLI_path_frame(targetFile, curFrame, 0); // fixed #frame-no
00475 
00476     // assign material + flags to new dm
00477     // if there's no faces in original dm, keep materials and flags unchanged
00478     mpoly = orgdm->getPolyArray(orgdm);
00479     if (mpoly) {
00480         mp_example = *mpoly;
00481     }
00482     /* else leave NULL'd */
00483 
00484     dm = fluidsim_read_obj(targetFile, &mp_example);
00485 
00486     if (!dm)
00487     {
00488         // switch, abort background rendering when fluidsim mesh is missing
00489         const char *strEnvName2 = "BLENDER_ELBEEMBOBJABORT"; // from blendercall.cpp
00490 
00491         if (G.background==1) {
00492             if (getenv(strEnvName2)) {
00493                 int elevel = atoi(getenv(strEnvName2));
00494                 if (elevel>0) {
00495                     printf("Env. var %s set, fluid sim mesh '%s' not found, aborting render...\n",strEnvName2, targetFile);
00496                     exit(1);
00497                 }
00498             }
00499         }
00500 
00501         // display org. object upon failure which is in dm
00502         return NULL;
00503     }
00504 
00505     // load vertex velocities, if they exist...
00506     // TODO? use generate flag as loading flag as well?
00507     // warning, needs original .bobj.gz mesh loading filename
00508     if (displaymode==3) {
00509         fluidsim_read_vel_cache(fluidmd, dm, targetFile);
00510     }
00511     else {
00512         if (fss->meshVelocities)
00513             MEM_freeN(fss->meshVelocities);
00514 
00515         fss->meshVelocities = NULL;
00516     }
00517 
00518     return dm;
00519 }
00520 #endif // WITH_MOD_FLUID
00521 
00522 DerivedMesh *fluidsimModifier_do(FluidsimModifierData *fluidmd, Scene *scene,
00523                         Object *ob,
00524                         DerivedMesh *dm,
00525                         int useRenderParams, int UNUSED(isFinalCalc))
00526 {
00527 #ifdef WITH_MOD_FLUID
00528     DerivedMesh *result = NULL;
00529     int framenr;
00530     FluidsimSettings *fss = NULL;
00531 
00532     framenr= (int)scene->r.cfra;
00533     
00534     // only handle fluidsim domains
00535     if (fluidmd && fluidmd->fss && (fluidmd->fss->type != OB_FLUIDSIM_DOMAIN))
00536         return dm;
00537     
00538     // sanity check
00539     if (!fluidmd || (fluidmd && !fluidmd->fss))
00540         return dm;
00541     
00542     fss = fluidmd->fss;
00543     
00544     // timescale not supported yet
00545     // clmd->sim_parms->timescale= timescale;
00546 
00547     // support reversing of baked fluid frames here
00548     if ((fss->flag & OB_FLUIDSIM_REVERSE) && (fss->lastgoodframe >= 0)) {
00549         framenr = fss->lastgoodframe - framenr + 1;
00550         CLAMP(framenr, 1, fss->lastgoodframe);
00551     }
00552     
00553     /* try to read from cache */
00554     /* if the frame is there, fine, otherwise don't do anything */
00555     if ((result = fluidsim_read_cache(ob, dm, fluidmd, framenr, useRenderParams)))
00556         return result;
00557     
00558     return dm;
00559 #else
00560     /* unused */
00561     (void)fluidmd;
00562     (void)scene;
00563     (void)ob;
00564     (void)dm;
00565     (void)useRenderParams;
00566     return NULL;
00567 #endif
00568 }
